column5: Somebody parked a car inside Al's tonight...I'd avoid the place tomorrow.
parked inside? what do you mean
CTV News @ 11:30 Apparently mechanical problems caused the car to drive right through the front window. Looks like a major clean up on Saturday.
Methinks this could be opportunity knocking . . .      I smell a BI I I  I   I    G sale comin' up . . .    only, instead of 'Door-Crasher Specials,' it'll be 'WINDOW-CRASHER Specials?'
I hope DMASSE is ok.
Flaherty's is a nice store, hopefully everything works out for them.
How old is that store? I can remember it from when I was a young,n. It,s on Dufferin right? Just down from the Fair bank swimm,n pond.
I THINK it MIGHT have been an Army/Navy surplus store at one time?
I'm sorry to hear that, I hope no one was hurt and I'm sure the folks at Flaherty's will be back up and running in no time.  Maureen
Yes Photoz, I lived close by when I was young and that's where we picked up any outdoor stuff that we needed. haven't been in many, many years but one of these days . . . They'll be up in no time.

ALL IS WELL NO ONE WAS HURT  Last night myself and Sam were working around the front of the store when I heard Sam yell Watch out..  I Mercedes Benz crashed at high speed into the front of the main Window.    It missed the counter and flew between the main wall and the counter....    Luckly no one was in the store at the time and that sam and I were on the other side of the counter...  We watched the vidoe ( cool to see )  but scary at the same time...  we both were standing there not more that 5 minutes earlier.  STORE IS OPEN FOR BUSINESS and we will move on..  Dave
Glad to hear everyone is ok - Windows can be replaced! Thanks for letting us know Dave.    Don
Wow Dave....lucky for you and Sam.  Over-time coming.   lol

First of all I am glad to hear no-one was hurt! I gotta ask, did you use the line " Well, thats the way the Mercedes bends"???? As well, are you going to post the video? Best wishes with the insurance company dealings.

First of all I was trying to explain to everyone who entered the store that it was not a SMASH AND GRAB thing.  Then it went to a DRIVE THRU  SERVICE,  Then finally a DOOR (and Window) CRASHER..  I think people like that  one the best...  I am trying to figue out how to post the pics from my RAZOR   but so far no luck  It scared the craaaap out of me and I couldnt believe even that I was safe I could have died..   we aswser the phone where the car was 10 times a hr.  and some how no one was killed....  anyway its done and I will post the pic and hopefully the video later  Dave
Glad everyone's O.K. Dave!
....Oh man that would have had me soil me shorts. Amazing what can happen in the blink of an eye. Glad to hear no one was hurt Dave.
glad no one was hurt, now if u can use that luck and catch some bass with me
Glad your ok....  i bet the footage is interesting
Dave,  I'm glad to hear nobody was hurt (except perhaps the driver of the the MBenz). I'll keep a lookout for your posted pics.
